class.name: EditorVCSInterface
class.brief_description: Version Control System (VCS) interface which reads and writes to the local VCS in use.
class.description: Used by the editor to display VCS extracted information in the editor. The implementation of this API is included in VCS addons, which are essentially GDNative plugins that need to be put into the project folder. These VCS addons are scripts which are attached (on demand) to the object instance of [code]EditorVCSInterface[/code]. All the functions listed below, instead of performing the task themselves, they call the internally defined functions in the VCS addons to provide a plug-n-play experience.

method.name: checkout_branch
method.description: Checks out to the `branch` and returns false if there is any error while performing checkout operation.

method.name: commit
method.description: Creates a version commit if the addon is initialized, else returns without doing anything. Uses the files which have been staged previously, with the commit message set to a value as provided as in the argument.

method.name: fetch
method.description: Fetchs changes from remote. For now 'origin' is hardcoded for remote name.

method.name: get_project_name
method.description: Returns the project name of the VCS working directory.

method.name: get_vcs_name
method.description: Returns the name of the VCS if the VCS has been initialized, else return an empty string.

method.name: initialize
method.description: Initializes the VCS addon if not already. Uses the argument value as the path to the working directory of the project. Creates the initial commit if required. Returns [code]true[/code] if no failure occurs, else returns [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_addon_ready
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the addon is ready to respond to function calls, else returns [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_vcs_initialized
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the VCS addon has been initialized, else returns [code]false[/code].

method.name: pull
method.description: Pulls changes of current branch from remote.

method.name: push
method.description: Pushes changes of current branch to remote.

method.name: set_up_credentials
method.description: Sets up username and password for remote.

method.name: shut_down
method.description: Shuts down the VCS addon to allow cleanup code to run on call. Returns [code]true[/code] is no failure occurs, else returns [code]false[/code].

method.name: stage_file
method.description: Stages the file which should be committed when [method EditorVCSInterface.commit] is called. Argument should contain the absolute path.

method.name: unstage_file
method.description: Unstages the file which was staged previously to be committed, so that it is no longer committed when [method EditorVCSInterface.commit] is called. Argument should contain the absolute path.
